# rahps
An `R` package for data access and reporting for the National Weather Service (NWS) Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service (AHPS) river gage forcasts.

## Install
To install the `fluvgeo` package, install from GitHub using the `devtools` package:

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github(repo = "mpdougherty/rahps@*release")
```

## Bug Reports
If you find any bugs using `rahps`, please open an [issue](https://github.com/mpdougherty/rahps/issues).
